project.name: J-C209A-CMUD-07-ST02-DT02-DF06-CF02-01
project.description: This test attempts to insert a new record into a MySQL database. In the event of a SQLException during execution of the insert command, diagnostic information about the database connection and SQL statement will be dumped to the output stream.

iopair.name: J-C209A-CMUD-07-ST02-DT02-DF06-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variables defining database connection parameters including username and password.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
